Text: Done by a fucking mason about the stupid and dangerous brotherhood..... Watch out ! Mason are a ridiculous (initiation nonsense) society, obsolete (no more need for secrecy since we have fredom of speech now), anachronic (believes in all the mumbo jumbo and nonsense of classical occult traditions, mysteries, etc.) besides being dangerous by the corruption it encourages (brother help brother, regardless of the justice of any proceedings). Dont be fooled by their supposed "wisdom", none really because they blocked access to women for centuries...
